item.title: Happy #WorldAnimalDay!Nature has a way of surprising us‚Äîand sometimes making us laugh out loud!The C
item.description: Happy #WorldAnimalDay!Nature has a way of surprising us‚Äîand sometimes making us laugh out loud!The Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards exhibition captures animals at their funniest while reminding us why protecting wildlife and their habitats matters. See the winning and finalist photos from this international competition, on view #AtTheMuseums through January 4, 2026.Exhibition by @comedywildlifephoto, in association with @terraesplendida. The Comedy Wildlife Awards support and donate 10% of their total net revenue to the Whitley Fund for Nature, a UK charity that supports conservation leaders working across the Global South.#ComedyWildlifePhotographyAwards #SpringfieldMuseums #WesternMass @explorewesternmass @springfielddowntown

item.title: Along with @steppes_travel we have put together the most amazing, bespoke and expert guided safari e
item.description: Along with @steppes_travel we have put together the most amazing, bespoke and expert guided safari ever travelling across Zambia‚Äôs South Luangwa and Lower Zambezi. You‚Äôll be exploring on foot, by canoe and on game drives alongside some of Africa‚Äôs most accomplished guides. How awesome is that?!This nine night magical journey will be led by competition friend and judge, the renowned British broadcaster, Kate Humble, and our very own Paul Joynson-Hicks MBE and Tom Sullam - co-founders of the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards, bringing a creative and conservation-focused perspective to the safari. We would love you to be part of this extraordinary trip, so please get in touch as places are extremely limited and likely to sell fast. For info email us: info@comedywildlifephoto.com#comedywildlife #safari #conservation @kmhumble @pj_hicks @sullamphoto

item.title: üêæ Une toute nouvelle exposition vedette ouvre ses portes au Centre des sciences :DR√îLES DE B√äTES : U
item.description: üêæ Une toute nouvelle exposition vedette ouvre ses portes au Centre des sciences :DR√îLES DE B√äTES : Un safari photo hilarant ! Pr√©sent√©e par @telusfr üìÖ D√®s le 23 octobre prochain, venez d√©couvrir 60 clich√©s √©tonnants d‚Äôanimaux captur√©s dans des situations cocasses, attendrissantes ou tout simplement improbables ! Cette galerie unique vous transportera √† travers les grands milieux naturels de la plan√®te üåç ‚Äî des p√¥les glac√©s aux for√™ts tropicales, en passant par les oc√©ans, les savanes et les zones d‚Äôeau douce.Au-del√† des rires, l‚Äôexposition nous sensibilise √† la conservation de la faune et de ses habitats, gr√¢ce √† une comp√©tition internationale qui rassemble chaque ann√©e des milliers de photographies venues du monde entier. üì∏üîç D√©couvrez-en plus sur la nouvelle exposition : lien en bio!Une exposition r√©alis√©e par The Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards, en partenariat avec Terra Espl√™ndida et le Centre des sciences de Montr√©al._____üêæ An All-new Feature Exhibition at the Science Centre: FUNNY CREATURES: A Wildly Hair-larious Photo Safari! Presented by @telus üìÖ Starting October 23rd, come enjoy 60 stunning photographs of animals captured in comical, cute, or downright crazy poses! Travel the world through this extraordinary photo safari and visit the great ecosystems of our planet üåç ‚Äî from its frozen polar regions, its oceans, and freshwater zones to its tropical forests and savannahs.The exhibition inspires laughter but also raises our awareness about the importance of protecting natural habitats to help protect wildlife. Come enjoy some of the best photos from around the world selected from the thousands submitted to the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards competition. üì∏Learn more about the Funny Creatures Exhibition: link in bio!An exhibition created by the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards in partnership with Terra Espl√™ndida and the Montr√©al Science Centre.@comedywildlifephoto #comedywildlife @terraesplendida #terraesplendida

item.title: It‚Äôs time for some laughs!!! Nikon Comedy Wildlife Awards has just announced the 2025 finalists - an
item.description: It‚Äôs time for some laughs!!! Nikon Comedy Wildlife Awards has just announced the 2025 finalists - and I am thrilled to share that this porcupine fish with its perpetual open mouth has made the cut as one of this year‚Äôs wildlife comedians! It‚Äôs a bit surreal to see my photo selected from nearly 10,000 submissions and now appearing across major media outlets.This little guy - with big round eyes, intense gaze, and a mouth frozen open, giving it a look of permanent shock - had made me laugh underwater. I am glad it‚Äôll now bring joy to more people.On a side note about porcupine fish, I don‚Äôt know if there are any marine scientists studying this species and how known their behaviours are, but when I went for snorkelling / fun diving just off the shore in the sea of Cortez, I noticed something interesting - it seems that these guys love to hang out next to other bottom feeders, often in groups too. I saw one or small groups of them hanging around different kinds of rays at the sandy bottom - spotted round ray, stingray, even a guitarfish (which I thought was a shark thanks to the slightly sharky look and the common name ‚Äòguitar shark‚Äô but is actually a ray). My hypothesis is that they find food where the rays stir up sand. They are generally quite shy, but curious too. When I freedive down to the bottom and stay, they sometimes come over to check, perhaps deciding whether I, too, qualify as a symbiotic feeding buddy. Anyway! Do check out all the Nikon Comedy Wildlife Awards finalists - they are absolutely hilarious! You‚Äôre in for a treat! All 40 finalists (including my perpetually shocked porcupine fish) will be on display at a free exhibition from 10-14 December, at the OXO Gallery in central London. If you‚Äôre around, make sure to check it out! #underwaterphotography #Conservation #wildlifephotography #comedywildlife #comedywildlifephotographyawards #funnyanimals @nikoneurope
